channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- CompactLogix 5380 controllers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- CompactLogix 5380 controllers

item.title: CVE-2024-8626|2024-10-08T16:35:04.513Z -- rockwell%20automation -- compactlogix%205380%20controllers
item.description: Due to a memory leak, a denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the Rockwell Automation affected products. A malicious actor could exploit this vulnerability by performing multiple actions on certain web pages of the product causing the affected products to become fully unavailable and require a power cycle to recover.
